TopicTitle: HELP HELP HELP!!!! What the hell?

Articles.Content:
Why did my international eve base thread just dissapear out off all my records?? I looks as if it never existed? Can anybody still see it? Thanks in advance for your help

Edited January 9, 2014 by panzerknoef

A million things could have happened.

Did you load up the correct save?

Have you loaded the craft recently? It may have blown itself to bits. Craft tend to do that sometimes.

Are you SURE you didn't accidently delete it?
No, he means the thread itself on the forums. This is weird as the General Picture showcase thread has gone as well.
I'm actually going for a thread with nearly 200 replies in the general discussion area but thanks anyway
Perhaps something happened that grossly violates forum rules. It's possible for moderators to move such a thread to a sub-forum where we, mere mortals, don't have access.

Where did the share your ksp pictures thread go!?!?!?!

*crosses fingers*

Please don't be April all over again...
I was thinking the same thing, let's hope we are wrong...
Seems odd it would just disappear without any notice.. wonder what's happening..

I remember seeing that thread; I know what you're talking about. I'll let the staff know and see what we can find out.

For those of you looking for the pictures thread, it was moved to the KSP Fanworks section.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24533-Show-off-your-awesome-KSP-pictures%21
Can we get a thread title, at least, so we know what we're looking for?

Can we get a thread title, at least, so we know what we're looking for?

According to the Google cache, it was http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60119-International-Eve-Base-Builders-always-accepted!

Edit: here's the google cache link if you need to recreate any of it

Edited January 11, 2014 by Tiberion

Woah. Okay, yep, literally vanished. I was expecting more of an access denied or something, if it had maybe been moved to an archive somewhere.

Hm. Maybe it got merged into another thread somewhere...
